website_summaries.verdict: This affordable hair curling wand is the perfect size to create those loose curls and waves, and they're long lasting to boot.
pros: The wand heats up quickly and is easy to learn, and with no clamp, it means no more worrying about getting it stuck
cons: The wand is difficult to use on short hair, and the included protective glove doesn't fit an entire hand

customer_reviews.title: Mr. /Ms. Idea person... "3 Silicone Strips"...???
customer_reviews.text: You're fired!!! This a HUGE-IRRITATING negative feature on this wand!!! Very bad concept... see video for further explanation. Those 3 little pieces of RUBBER... made this a flat out..... NO. I like perfet, flawless curls on my clients sew-ins. They don't pay for 'jacked-up' curls which is what this provides especially if your are moving fast to keep your chair filled. I love Conair but I DEFINITELY will be returning this wand. And by tha' way it might just be me...all wands should come with a glove.... a full.... hand glove. Not some 'cut-corner' piece of useless junk. Again, see video.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Rater

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for the price! Definitely takes some getting used it as there is a technique to it. I haven't really used the glove... it was difficult to grab my hair with it on. I added a picture to show what my curls looked like the next day.
customer_reviews.author: H. Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Sold a Used Product-Gross
customer_reviews.text: This is a used product. The instructions in the box were out of the plastic, but it was all shoved in the box. The numbers for the heat are worn away, there was a hair stuck by the handle and it’s missing the glove so you don’t burn your hand. It works witch is the only positive.
customer_reviews.author: K. B. Serino Panzica

customer_reviews.title: Infiniti Pro
customer_reviews.text: Love my Infiniti Pro! Easy to use and gives beautiful spiral curls that last all day !
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought this curling wand was going to be bad but it turned out that this is probably the ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this curling wand was going to be bad but it turned out that this is probably the best curling wand you are going to find and at this price!! It's goes all the way up to 400 degrees and the curls are ready in seconds. Just look at my photos I'm in love
customer_reviews.author: Kendraaa

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaws Make It Difficult to Use :(
customer_reviews.text: This curler heats up quickly, but I have a few issues with its design: 1. The placement of the buttons is super inconvenient. I found myself accidentally turning the curler off, or inadvertently changing the heat settings multiple times while trying to curl - especially when I was styling the back part or my hair. 2. Barrel seems very short. I have medium length hair, and I found it difficult to curl the entire length. May be better for short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: It curls
customer_reviews.text: I like it. First time using this type of curling rod. Came with a fingers protector half glove thing. I'd purchased a heat styling glove to go with it already, but it does come with something.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Culp

customer_reviews.title: this works so well and I don't see how a higher priced product could produce better quality. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I could have spent more money buying a fancy one. But in the end, this works so well and I don't see how a higher priced product could produce better quality. I love it. The little 3 finger glove it comes with is kinda awkward to wear. I don't use it. It's not necessary if you know how to use it. I've never used a wand before and it only took me about ten minutes to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Brittaney James

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curling wand so much! I have always had long straight hair that doesn't hold curls, but with this it lasts all day and even can be slept on and have wavey curls the next day. I didn't expect it to work that well at all on my hair since nothing else does. I don't even use any hair spray or anything with mine. I can have loose or tight curls depending on how much hair and how tightly I wrap them. It takes me about 30 min I'd say to do my super long hair and I use the hottest setting. The price is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: ToriGirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This not only made gorgeous curls for my night out but kept them in till the next morning. I have to straighten my hair first so my hair would not hold a curl for very long...now it does. I'm so happy I found this.Easy to use and a great price. My snap chat photo shows it
customer_reviews.author: SF FAN

customer_reviews.title: Curly and wavy
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Wanted something that could do both loose and tight curls. This does both. You can choose from 4 diff temps, has an on/off switch, comes with a heat glove and is light weight. Easy to use. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Perez

customer_reviews.title: It arrived with someone else’s hair on it. The ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with someone else’s hair on it. The “glove” is cheap felt. The temperature labels wore off in under a week. It only stays hot a few minutes. The cord twists at the base, so it swivels when you set it down-fun surprise!
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Curls my hair so nice, and it's so quick and easy! I do have wavy hair that loves to curl, so.I cannot speak for people with straight hair. But for me it has been awesome. I can literally go to bed with my hair wet and in a crazy bun, and within 15-20 min, my hair looks like I went to a salon! The little 3 finger glove that comes with it is pretty useless though. Just buy some of those shower scrub gloves, they protect your hands fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Collegebooks987

customer_reviews.title: Makes AMAZING curls!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this curling wand! I bought this for my daughter, and even though it took a little while getting used to (we have always used the traditional curling iron), I caught on quick! I did a lot of research before purchasing this. I was looking for the best one for the best value, and this one was rated among the top ten. Decided to give it a try, and we are very pleased with the results. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to purchase a wand.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Anne

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't have a clamp
customer_reviews.text: In case you're like me and didn't realize from the item description that it does not have a clamp to hold down your hair while curling, you will find that this is really cumbersome to use. You have to use your free hand to wind your hair around the wand, then be careful not to burn your fingers (they enclose a mitt to protect your fingers, but I feel like this just reinforces how inconvenient this thing is). I returned it and got a different model.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ashman

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I expected but what I got was a curling iron. It was a little odd feeling to use at first and I burnt myself more than once due to not having the part to clamp the hair like a normal curling iron. It worked alright but honestly; nothing special. They should have just kept the little baby "half glove" - it was worthless to me. The off switch is located to where it is easy to turn the iron off while you are in the process of curling your hair....not great either.
customer_reviews.author: KKaren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I have not found an iron that works on my hair until this one! It worked incredibly well and was very easy to use! What’s better than that? The price ! You cannot find a deal as good as this one ever. You really get bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: brianna swan

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these in college and adored it. Sometime between moving from the srat castle to the real world, I lost it. I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS. It heats up super fast, it's so simple to use, and it cuts down curling/waving time in half compared to using my straightener. I have a massive amount of fine hair. This curls or waves perfectly without breaking my ends. The last one I had lasted 4 years and I really think this guy will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 12 year old as her first curling wand. She has fine, straight hair, and we used the lowest setting. The temperature controls are good. This was my first time using a curling wand and I don't care for it. I was afraid I was going to burn her the whole time. She was really happy with the result, especially the no burns! We didn't use any prep or style product, curl lasted a few hours. I'm sure it'll be even better when we use the right stuff and get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Z

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this curling wand! I had such a hard time finding something that would and could curl my hair and now I did! Just be careful you don't burn your hands like me!
customer_reviews.author: Achritiste

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I like these curling irons, I've never owned any before and I always wanted to. I just wish I did a little more research on the different sizes that they come, because I ordered mine too big, I was hoping for a smaller one because I have shorter hair but other than that these irons do what they're supposed to do. Edit: I died not realize that this particular size that I purchased was made for longer hair (🤦🏾‍♀️ duh Sasha) but these are now my favorite curling utensil, they give me lucious beautiful curls 🥴
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this curling wand! I have stubborn hair and this thing worked wonders on it! My hair doesn't usually hold heat very well...but this is a game changer for me! The pics of my hair were taken 15 hours AFTER I curled it! Its very easy to use. The little glove (I lovingly nicknamed my "Michael Jackson glove" lol) helps, but it does feel a little sloppy. I think I will buy a full glove. The wand heats up quickly, and the various heat settings are great. I love the conair infinity pro tools. I have the ceramic straightener and I love it, that's what convinced me to try this wand. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this--takes minutes to style!
customer_reviews.text: Adore this curling wand! I highly recommend it. I have fine, thick hair that will curl well when I work with my hair wet but on the second or third day (especially) in winter, my curls are flat and boring. This wand allows me to easily add bounce and definition back into my hair and the curl actually stays! I've had other curling irons that didn't keep a curl in my hair for 5 minutes, let along most of the day. It's super fast and easy to use and I really am happy that I purchased this over the high end expensive wands.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Eckmann

customer_reviews.title: 1 1/4-inch to 3/4
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 1 1/4-inch to 3/4 inch wand because I wanted looser curls. I have the thinner size of a Conair wand which I love and wanted a thicker size. This wand heats up so quickly which is convenient. It also comes in multiple sizes depending on what you’re in the market for. I’ve had the smaller version of this wand for 6 years and it works as good as ever so the quality and longevity of this product is what made me stick with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: not friendly user
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product, it is not user friendly, tried to use it and already burned my finger even with the glove on. Bad waste of money. It does not do well with my hair. Will have to send it back because I do not like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful big shiny curls not possible with my regular conair curling iron
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with a full glove not the odd shaped half glove. I had used the same exact 1” Conair Instant Heat curling iron for probably over 22 years, no joke, until it finally died on me. I could’ve bought the same model, but decided to try my hand at a curling wand. I did my research before buying on either a straight barrel or conical wand and decided on this one with its high reviews and reasonable price and it was a Conair, since my last one lasted for over 20+ years because I was looking for medium to big curls/waves.
customer_reviews.author: mess_hall_mommy

customer_reviews.title: First time wand user
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using a wand. It comes with a small heat-resistant glove to use. I only used it for the first few times using the wand, before I felt comfortable enough to use the wand without it. The wand has several heat settings and is very simple to use. It works great and is very smooth on my hair. I would highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Aziz & Giana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value for this curling wand. Frizz free, shiny curls in minutes. Auto shutoff.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 16 year old daughter who has hair just above the shoulders. Great curling wand, especially for the price! Has multiple heat settings. VERY fast heat up - just 30 seconds. Great for long and shorter hair. Can allow different types of curls depending on the way you turn the wand and wrap the hair. Has built in stand for safe cooling and auto shutoff! Does not cause the hair to frizz and creates shiny, bouncy curls. As always, recommend spritzing the hair with a heat protectant made to protect the hair when high heat is applied. Highly recommend this curling wand. Makes it easy to achieve beautiful, shiny, bouncy curls in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne N. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It works! And easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new wand! I read some reviews saying it was hard to handle? Made me a little skeptical of buying this product, but I went ahead and still bought it anyway, And omg! I'm happy I did. It was SUPER easy to control. I had no difficulty using it. At first I did tight curls then I brushed em out and now it looks like I have natural curls. I give this 5 stars! Super happy
customer_reviews.author: Jen s

customer_reviews.title: To Goodwill it shall go
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the butt to work with and make the "curls" look ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetlass

customer_reviews.title: Useless 3 fingered glove, not full glove
customer_reviews.text: This curling wand does the job well enough. It’s inexpensive which is the reason I bought it for my first curling wand. My biggest concern is the three fingered glove that comes with. It will not stay on while I’m curling my hair and I had to just take it off after it fell off more than 5 times. Ended up burning myself twice because they don’t give you a proper glove. I’m just going to get a full glove at a beauty supply store or here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a totally cumbersome, poorly designed product. I gave away to a friend who routinely uses a curling iron. She actually threw away -and the tiny three fingered "glove" is useless. How people actually curl hair with this thing (without burning fingers, as well) is beyond me!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great curling iron but...
customer_reviews.text: Great curling iron.. It seems to work for alot of people.. For some reason though my hair would not take the curl.. Not sure if I was not doing something right or what but I didn't want to keep trying it out of fear that I may damage it with the constant heat. From the reviews though it seems that this curling iron works really good for alot of people. So maybe its just my hair ;)
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great for my new short do!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once, BUT it is the best product I've used for curling my hair to get a soft wave. I've used straighteners, curling irons, even the Conair fashion curl iron, which is a close second, but won't work as well with my short hair. This curling wand is so easy to use. The glove isn't great but I was able to work without it, and I've never used a wand before. I used the lowest heat setting because I have very thin hair and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsie Blake

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I am not very hair-raiser savvy, and this wasn't a huge help. The cord gets in the way a lot when in trying to do the right side of my head. Could just be me being awkward and uncoordinated though. The little 3-finger glove thing is one of the weirdest things I've ever with. Doesn't match any outfit (jk). Seriously it's an okay iron. Position of the on/off button kinda stinks too.
customer_reviews.author: Shutters

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I have fine straight hair that doesn’t like to stay curly. This worked great for me. I personally am not a fan of the finger glove thing that came with it (Only goes in the left hand). 330 was perfect for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes, yes!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a day or two to figure out how to curl my hair with this but now that I have it down- I LOVE IT! It wasn't super expensive so I didn't feel bad buying it without knowing how to curl my own hair and the curls last all day! It has so many different heat settings which is great because my hair is fairly thick and doesn't always take well with low heat! I would truly recommend this to anyone and I've realized the trick is to hold it upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh V.

customer_reviews.title: Unless you’ve got unlimited time, this isn’t worth the fight!
customer_reviews.text: This thing isn’t meant for hair that’s super soft and baby fine ... it’s super hard to use! I’ve used it once since I bought it over a month ago ... I’m a teacher who, like thousands of others ... lives far from work. I get up super early and absolutely don’t have the extra time or patience in the morning to fight with this thing right now (yes, working over summer... if you read this and think ... but it’s summer). I hope I get used to it, I love the waves ... just not the fight it takes to get there!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Marker

customer_reviews.title: Curls for days
customer_reviews.text: Love this curling iron. Bought as a replacement for mine that got fried and died in Italy. It produced natural looking curls and last. I live in Florida and even with our humidity, my curls last. I have very long hair, almost waist length, and the barrel is long enough to accommodate my hair. The iron heats up quickly which I appreciate .
customer_reviews.author: BeeBerman

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing heats up literally 30 seconds or less and it works I use this to flatten my wigs at the top And it’s a good heat press as well. It holds heat and curls. I was so excited to get it! Definitely recommend to anyone who looking for a affordable curler because this is everything
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Holy mother of amazingly easy curls, batman!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It was a great purchase. It's so easy to use and it makes beautiful curls in my hair that last all day. I used to try this with a regular iron and sometimes it would look awesome and sometimes it would flop. I've used this product on my hair twice now with perfect results in 15 minutes. I've also used it on two of my daughters... also gorgeous. Love, love, love this product. You cannot go wrong for the price. My only complaint is that the cord is a little short, but as long as I'm standing in the bathroom at the counter it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charity A Nix

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner curling wand
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my first curling wand and it made curling my hair sooooo much easier than using a flat iron or a regular curling iron. It gets pretty hot and produces beautiful curls. my only regret is that I didn't get a larger barrel. Also, the 'glove' that was sent with it is an absolute joke so I would suggest that if you're gonna purchase this wand, get a glove separately. Overall though, it's worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Great wand, I just wish it came with a FULL glove
customer_reviews.text: Great curling wand! The curls last much longer than a regular curling iron. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because the product came with a useless partial-glove, it only covers two fingers and the thumb. It doesn’t even stay put when you try to wear it. Plus it’s not reversible to wear on either hand since only one side has the heat protective layer. A full glove with heat protection on both sides (to make it reversible) should be standard with a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Good curler wand for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have the red version, my aunt wanted the same curler wand so she got a pink one. She loves it as do I. I recommend this wand if you are looking for a curler wand. Curls last a long time. Has adjustable heat settings. Comes with a heat resistant 3-finger glove. The cord swivels so won’t be annoyingly in the way. Quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: What’s all the fuss about?
customer_reviews.text: This works ok. It gets really hot, and does curl hair. It’s kind of hard to use, and since you can’t get the very ends of your hair without burning your fingertips, there are always a few awkward straight pieces at the ends. I had heard good things about this product, but I honestly think there are better ways to curl your hair.
customer_reviews.author: habow

customer_reviews.title: Not really impressed
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm just not using it right, but I wanted to buy an inexpensive wand to start out with. I wasn't expecting salon quality at the price I paid, but I've only used this once and tried to use it once more. It works I think, I'm pretty sure it is the way I'm using it. My stylist made it look so easy, I guess I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Odom

customer_reviews.title: Great curls, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use but wear your glove, it's a moment and u burn yourself. I thought I was super careful and burned myself twice. It is not the Wand's fault !! Mine 100% I love the curls. I use heat protector and let them set for a few min , spraying them with comb through hair spray to keep them in longer. Sometimes last till my next wash, 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great Loose Curls!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's easy to use. It's definitely easier to use than a curling iron. I got really good using it, so now all I have to do is cool dry with blow dryer and then wave. Make sure you use a heat resistant spray like the Argan Oil Heat Resistance by HSI. It works too! The only thing I didn't like is it came with a 2 finger glove and you really need a full hand glove. Overall, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: LuMont

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I have short hair and this is perfect for natural looking curls due to the barrel size! My only complaint is the buttons are so easy to hit on accident and I always find myself accidentally thronging it off... besides that, it’s amazing for the price. I also love that it can be propped up on the counter and the end isn’t part of the heat plate.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have short fine hair. I don't know how anyone uses this. The glove really didn't spare me from the burns while trying. But I just found no way to way to make this work for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: jannelee

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure it’s great
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally wavy hair, so why the heck would I buy this? Impulse and it was a good price I guess. I do straighten my hair quite a bit, so about twice I’ve used it to put a little wave back in and it seems to be ok. I’m low maintenance and seriously had to watch a video on YouTube to learn how to use a wand, so with practice, I think this wand will make a nice beach wave. In hindsight I’ll probably just NOT straighten my hair if I want the wave [facepalm].
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Curls really last!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best curling irons I’ve ever used. My curls have lasted 2 days now and they normally wouldn’t last longer than an hour. I usually have to straighten my hair then curl it to tame the friz, not with this. It’s a great curling iron. The straighter of this brand and line is also the best strightner I’ve used it’s lasted me 5 years now and it’s still amazing. I’ve used $200 strightners that don’t work as well it lasted as long. Great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Wavy curls beach waves
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great and has volume temp control. Curls last a few days. It’s an amazing curling iron and it’s so great to have for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this is good for longer hair, but I found it hard to use. The gloves are worthless so I end up burning my fingers. Didn't send back hoping I can use it for some spot curling, but time will tell. Not something I would want to use often.....too frustrating. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Creates" MY CURLS BUT BETTER" look as a touch up
customer_reviews.text: It's creates natural spiral curls. It came with a half heat glove also. I use it to define sections of unruly curls around my face when I allow my hair to air dry curly. It creates a "my curls but better " look for me and I always get compliments on my hair when I touch up my natural curls with this wand. Must buy! N excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: Safety concern?
customer_reviews.text: The handle stays warm if left plugged in to an outlet, even when power is off. Difficult to use on shorter hair. Not recommended for use on children's hair if needing to curl close to child's head/ scalp. Kids move to much too use a wand on -- just go with a traditional curling iron that has the clamp to hold hair in place.
customer_reviews.author: JBes

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This heats up quickly! It does my hair wonderfully and is easy to use. Watch a tutorial on how to use it and you should be good. I don’t even use the glove thing. I think it’s much better on my hair than a regular curling iron Bc it’s not squeezing and pulling my hair. For the price, you can’t beat it! I get loose curls even on the lower heat setting and have not even had to go up a heat setting.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good one but just it ain’t one for me 😆
customer_reviews.text: Product was neatly delivered with hands on instructions. The heat setting was quick and perfect . Curling was set so quick. Unfortunately I Experienced this mild headache that prolonged for an hr or two after using this for about 2 sections of my hair (forehead) Tried again with very low heat setting next day yet sill had a headache. May be this isn’t for me. Returned it. I envy those who all using this without a prob.. lol 😂
customer_reviews.author: Preethi

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly for gorgeous curls!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Couldn't believe the price! I have long, naturally wavy hair, and this wand does wonders to create gorgeous curls that last all day. Cooler temps give looser waves and higher temps give tighter curls. I usually spray some texturizing spray and a medium hold hair spray and work in sections from the base of my neck toward my scalp. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Because Aliens

customer_reviews.title: The best curling wand on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the same Infinitipro Curling Wand by Conair for at least 5 years and it’s still going strong! It gets hot fast, curls instantly and is so easy to use. Just wrap sections of your hair around it and keep holding onto the end of your hair. Wait 5 seconds and release. It takes me about 6 minutes to do my hair, and the curls last for a few days. Give me a very relaxed, beachy wave if I use larger sections and keep hair wrapped around the top (thicker) portion of the barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Christine N

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: i was disappointed when i got this hair wand:/ I was using it and all of a sudden it would just shut off and it did this MANY times! obviously this was really annoying bc i would keep having to turn it on while i was curling my hair because it wasn’t getting hot enough to hold a curl:/
customer_reviews.author: TemeculaMom

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one of these for many years and love it so much I bought one for a friend who was complaining about her traditional curling iron. She loves it, and was stoked about the heat glove that comes with it. Leaves hair with cute curls, and has various heat levels which is great for tighter or looser curls when desired. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. Super easy to use, heated up quickly, and great packaging. I have super short hair, but it still worked great. It didn’t make the curls tight since my hair is so short, but it made the perfect “beach waves”
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: Great wand. Holds curls for days, even without hair spray. Don't worry about shaking or combing through the curls,they never loose the curl.i usually curl the night before, and they still look great in the morning. It does the exact same thing as the Remington wand, but it's cheaper. Also it curls faster and better than a traditional curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Rachna D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So for someone who is challenged when it comes to curling hair and my hair doesn't curl easily or holds curls at all this is amazing! Tried it today and I need some practice to get it exactly how I want it but it was simple to use, curls super well and holds my curls all day. I had it up and worked out, went to work and still holding the curls perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect curling iron
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap, it gets really hot, and it is the only curling iron I've used/have had used on my super straight, fine hair that actually keeps a curl longer than 20 minutes. A friend of mine has one and I used it for a theater show where I was running around sweating and flipping my hair upside down every night, and it kept my curl every day/every show, even through the next morning. I finally bought one of my own recently, and it's changed my hair game.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Favorite curling iron
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite curling iron! I’ve had one for about 15 years and it stopped working. I’ve been looking for a replacement and this is it. Makes the perfect curl that lasts all day! I’ve tried other curling irons and they don’t come anywhere close to this one!
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice wand for a low price
customer_reviews.text: This curling wand works great and what a great price! Very easy to use and have not burned myself (yet) so have not needed to use the heat glove included. The videos were helpful on how to wrap your hair around the wand. The curl lasts all day and night!
customer_reviews.author: vcraig

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great when I'm getting ready to head out the door you can literally wand curl your hair in 10 minutes because it doesn't take long for it to heat up fast and also it is a great tool for the messy curly look and I love using this almost everyday this is my new favorite iron to use on my hair I don't even touch my flat irons anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Shawtina Iglus

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to work with it is impossible to curl your hair when there is isn't he clip the hold the hair in place when you wrap it!
customer_reviews.author: Khristyne  Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for the economic price. This wand works VERY well. I have very long, almost straight hair. I only keep the curling strands of hair on the wand for about 7 sec, and my hair is super curled. If you want beach waves all you have to do is brush out the curls once your done. The only small thing (which I don’t care for at all) is that the labeling on the wand itself wipes off very easily. Like as easy as you rubbing the words and they come off (the temp. labels, brand name) but since the wand has different colored lights for the heat settings you can still see what the level is.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Loza

customer_reviews.title: Weird rubber things on iron, glove only for left hand
customer_reviews.text: It works good, can tell it’s made cheaply. It has these weird rubber things going down the iron itself so you can’t just slide the hair off. The glove can only go on your left hand because it’s only heat protected on that side, so you can’t use the glove when you go to do the opposite side of your head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Body wave curls
customer_reviews.text: I like these wand curlers. Took me some time to get used to because I’m a beginner lol. I realized these are small wand curlers size, so you have to take small pieces of hair to get the full effect!
customer_reviews.author: Jayfree

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have long, fine hair that NEVER holds a curl. As in, by lunch my hair is flat. This pic is on day two of my curls from this wand with no product in it at all. Amazing!! My world is rocked! The heat glove is worthless but I didn’t need it anyway. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: etedesco

customer_reviews.title: Love! Cute and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! My mom had been telling me that I am looking not the prettiest every day. ( it sucks, i know), so I decided to get this wand bc it was on prime deal! And boy is this a magic wand!! It made my hair look healthy as well, which usually doesnt happen with other curling irons. So im super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dorina Ceka

customer_reviews.title: It works SO well
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the ONLY tool that will curl my hair. I have tried so many curling irons and had just accepted the fact that nothing would curl my hair, but then I bought this! It changed everything. It curls my hair beautifully and doesn’t make it frizzy. It’s the perfect curl and it’s so easy to use! It even comes with a little glove.
customer_reviews.author: Ephes.429

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, Excellent product!! I am super pleased with my wand.
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy! For the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy! For the price, the Infiniti Pro was exactly what I was looking for. The heat choices are predetermined but can work with several types of hair. I got my IP today amd decided to put it to use on my neice's hair (see pics). She was happy and even though I have to part the hair very thin to get a good press, it only took about 40 minutes (I'm not a professional you see😉). All in all very happy with my purchase. FyI. Purchasing the HCI Argan Oil Thermal Protection spray was also a good idea!
customer_reviews.author: Shania

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wand ! Affordable and easy to use. I love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Hicela

customer_reviews.title: Yes just yes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one!! Only had to replace the first because I lost it while moving and my hair missed having it lol. The curls are always flawless. I use It on my naturally curly hair to enhance my curl. The barrel of the curler is the perfect size to match my 2b curls
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not at all "talented" when it comes to styling my hair. I have no idea what I'm doing. I can only straighten my hair, put it in a ponytail or a sloppy bun. I've never been able to properly curl my hair, not even with rollers. Sad I know. But this wand has changed everything! I have curled my hair every day since I bought it a few weeks ago. I'm obsessed!!! Easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Came packaged nicely, cute wand
customer_reviews.text: Reccomend by an insta friend, she has used this wand for years, came with a little package of argon oil which is nice, and a small hand cover/glove to help with use, I haven’t used it yet but impressed with the packaging and how cute the wand is in person, I like how it has a plastic tip to be able and hold onto for styling
customer_reviews.author: Mother Of Many

customer_reviews.title: beautiful curls
customer_reviews.text: This curling wand creates beautiful curls that lasts for days.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda Walter

customer_reviews.title: Holds my curls great
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I have very long, thick hair and this is the ONLY iron that will hold a curl. Very impressed. Two of my cousins recommended this particular model to me and they have even more hair than me. Great purchase, great price. No need to spend $100 on other irons, this will do the job. (And I don’t use product)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Get RID of your old curling iron!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wand, I'm one of those who's horrible with a regular curling iron. I always get the line imprint on my curls from the clamp on regular curling irons so then I just get frustrated and end up straightening my hair instead but this wand makes curling my hair super easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Curls for Days!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thin straight and rarely holds a curl. I’ve used hot rollers, curling irons, and all kinds of other styling tools. This is my favorite! I can set my hair quickly and the curls will literally last until the next day. I love this wand!
customer_reviews.author: Superstefmom

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this wand. I thought it was a "curling iron". Even with the heat glove , I burnt my hand. I found it very hard to use. Definitely wouldn't recommend for someone with really thick hair ,like myself or you'll be using this product for hours on end . I'll stick with a curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This works better than I expected for the price. I get gorgeous curls in much less time than a curling iron, that turn to soft waves the next day. Gets hot in 30 seconds! The glove it comes with IS thin but works well enough for me. It’s a half glove that covers your left thumb index and middle finger. So you may want a full glove, but if I’m careful this works okay.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka

customer_reviews.title: Must haves in your hair Arsenal!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these on the 8th I must say they’ve cut my curling time down in half,they heat up really fast,they give you a glove to protect your hand from getting burned while curling your hair which was great.I’d definitely recommend these curlers.wish I had purchased sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Msgooodietwoshoe

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely horrible at doing hair. I can’t use a curling iron to save my life, but this little tool is amazing! Seriously, it’s LIFE CHANGING! So easy to use and makes beautiful curls that will last days. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: YooperGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, coarse hair and am an amateur when it comes to doing anything with my hair. This was easy and worked very well !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic wand
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a wand until my daughter requested for one. Found this iron to be highly rated so I bought and very glad I did. Worked this gem on my daughters super thick, super wavy island hair and it was so effortless and precisely what I felt the result should be. Nothing has ever been able to get through her locks. Held up all night through her performance on stage in blinding lights and heat. Awesome! Great investment. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too challenging to use
customer_reviews.text: Was burning my hand, very unwieldy. I'm not good with hair, so I don't recommend for other with the same problem. I found a very tiny curling iron works the best to create curls for medium-length hair.
customer_reviews.author: Emma the Cat

customer_reviews.title: The Onr
customer_reviews.text: This is a bomb curling wand. I am black with natural hair and it makes the best curls and you dont have to hold the hair on the heat for not long at all. I was so impressed on the curl it makes. Also easy to use. I havent bought a curling iron in about 10 years and so glad i found this one. I was skeptical at first and thought i was gonna have to buy a few to find the best one but I am beyond happy on the quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: BRITTANY

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! This curling wand works great! It is my first time using one and I was skeptical after reading some reviews. But the product arrived in new condition, it's easy to use, and is well worth the money! It comes with a glove, but it's not really necessary. I'm able to curl my waist length hair in less than ten minutes when I'm getting ready for work and the curls last my entire 12 hour shift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item if you like doing your hair
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 year old and she uses it almost every other day since Christmas. She was able to figure out how to use it without any help it guidance. It creates beautiful curls! Definitely a purchase worth making.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Curling wand
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! The cord is way too short so while I was tugging on it to try and reach my daughters head and angle it the way I needed to, I burnt her poor little ear. I'm not experienced at using curling wands but if the cord was longer I probably would have been ok!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Jones

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on the fence about buying a curling wand and have even looked into the brand name expensive ones. I decided to give this one a try and I’m SO happy. I very seldom write reviews but I felt I needed to for this. Don’t waste the money on an expensive one!! This STILL gave me perfect curls after I flat ironed my hair and did 2 workouts through the day!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The wand is a little smaller than expected but it’s not a problem. I also Just turned it on to see if it works and it gets hot pretty fast and I love that. Will leave an updated review once used.
customer_reviews.author: Renee T Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wand!! A must have for hot tools. The possibilities are endless. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the temp control are placed up top so it's easy to accidentally change your temp up or down while gripping the handle
customer_reviews.author: ninja

product_meta.title: INFINITIPRO BY CONAIR Tourmaline Ceramic Curling Wand
product_meta.description:
Size:1-0.5 InchGet instant style with no clamp! This Conair curling wand creates tighter or looser curls with one simple wrap. The Conair InfinitiPro Tourmaline Ceramic Curling Wand features a clamp-free, conical tapered barrel from 1 to 1 ½ inches to give you control of your curl. Make a variety of trendy twisted spirals, curls and waves with no kinks or creases. Tourmaline Ceramic technology eliminates frizz for silky shiny hair and provides ultra-high, even heat—up to 400 degrees F—with no damaging hot spots. To create tight spiral curls, simply wrap small sections of hair tightly around the top and hold for a few seconds. For loose bouncy curls, just wrap wider sections of hair around the thicker part of the barrel and release. With this curling wand there’s never clamping or tangling! This tapered curling wand heats up in 30 seconds and has uniform heat recovery while maintaining high heat for faster styling. LED indicator lights let you easily know when it’s reached your desired temperature. And with 5 precision heat settings, it can accommodate all hair types. Convenient auto-off feature means you never need to worry if you’ve left your curling wand on. The professional length line cord means you can easily style and reach any part of your hair. This fun raspberry-colored curling wand also includes a bonus insulated thermal glove to protect your hands and offer total heat protection, even during direct hot wand contact. Create the curls you want with the Conair InfinitiPro Tourmaline Ceramic Curling Wand.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Conical barrel tapers from 1-inch to 1/2-inch for tighter to looser curls
No clamp – simply wrap for kink-free, natural, curls
Tourmaline Ceramic technology reduces frizz and adds shine

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
